items.sentence: Isn't there a chance that Tom is doing that?

I don't think Tom does that as well as Mary.

Tom seems to be unwilling to do that for us.
I'd rather stay at a hotel near the airport.
Tom was interviewed by a newspaper reporter.
Tom asked me why he was required to do that.

It might be more complicated than you think.
Tom could hardly wait to unwrap the present.
Tom is giving me the silent treatment again.
Tom can't be accused of being narrow-minded.

This gold-inlaid sword is a family heirloom.
